reviewText: Great product with a lot of information.
I'm a 9 year ASE tech. this is everything you need to know.
Literally arrived before we expected it

Great video on teardown and rebuilding of engines. Dont listen to some of the guys saying he is using an impact to tighten the piston bearing caps down. He doesn't. I learned a lot while watching this video and would recommend it. I rebuild transmissions for a living and this helped alot on the engine rebuild i started this year.

Great details and informative.  No matter what your previous level of experience this will get you to the rebuild and through it. Only if you think a hammer is the first tool of a mechanic will this info be of no service to you.

Box wrench dvd has delivered. One of the best engine building dvd im a novice and
They made it so clear to remove and install a engine from your vehicle. I probably will order another one just in case I wear out the one I have well worth it and some. Great great job and simple to understand.
Very helpful info for the novice/beginner/intermediate mechanic. I wish I had this info available to me when I first started.
